Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Up to 2.5% Citi Rebate on M1 mobile and broadband bills.
Earn up to 10% Citi Rebate and redeem at over 700 locations for anything you like.
Up to 5% Citi Rebate on overseas retail purchases.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 1% of current a/c balance plus 1% outstanding amount plus late charges or S$50, whichever is higher

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Only existing M1 phone and/or broadband subscribers are eligible to apply.
5% Citi Rebate is for Overseas retail purchases of at least S$3,000 in your statement of account.
1% Citi Rebate is for Overseas retail purchases of less than S$3,000 in your statement of account.
Overseas cashback is capped at S$200 Citi Rebates per statement of account.

2.5% for M1 bills above S$300, 2.0% for bills between S$200 - S$300, 1.5% for M1 bills less than S$200. Please note that certain M1 items such as auto-roaming charges, telepol / infoline / 1-900 calls / directory assistance / equipment installation charges / third party charges are not eligible to earn Citi Rebate. Applicable only to M1 bills charged to the Citibank M1 Visa Card on a recurring basis
